text: Richard M. Weiner (6 February 1930 - 13 August 2020) was a Romanian-born German professor of theoretical physics. He worked at the University of Marburg in Marburg, Germany. He was an associate of the Laboratoire de Physique Th√©orique at Paris-Sud 11 University. Weiner was born in Czernowitz, Romania.
